title: Trust
description: In this last part of Joe’s and D’s story, Joe will have to decide what he really wants. And how far he’s willing to go for it. He is scheduled to leave for Amsterdam in a few days, and afterwards he’s got to be at his office for almost two weeks to cover for Steve. Will he see Christine again? Or Liz? And how are things with D going to turn out?
author: Billy Wood-Smith
